biocontainers.name: cryfa
biocontainers.summary: A secure encryption tool for genomic data

biotools.summary: Secure encryption tool for genomic data, namely in Fasta, Fastq, VCF, SAM and BAM formats, which is also capable of reducing the storage size of Fasta and Fastq files.

bioschemas.name: Cryfa
bioschemas.summary: Secure encryption tool for genomic data, namely in Fasta, Fastq, VCF, SAM and BAM formats, which is also capable of reducing the storage size of Fasta and Fastq files.
